text: Ana nganijim’bichilila ŵanganyammwe abali ja aŵala ŵapaujo penu? Ŵandu ŵa Nuhu, ŵa Adi ni ŵa Samuda, kwisa soni aŵala ŵamunyuma mwao, ŵangaakwamanyilila ikaŵeje Allah? Ŵaichilile Achimitenga ŵao ni ilosyo yakuonechela, basi ni ŵauchisye magasa gao kukamwa kwao (paagaluma ligongo lyaukali), ni ŵatite: “Chisimu uwwe tukaaniile yantumisyidwe nayoyi, soni chisimu uwwe tuli nchikaiko chekulungwa chakaichila yankutuŵilanjilayi.”
